Reviews.Title: More than complete!
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: The package is so complete that you feel that yo aren't gonna use it all... We'll see and it's a good deal for the buck.

ProductInfo.Features:
5x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle Lens
12.1 MP High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor with DIGIC 5 Image Processor
Utilizes Canon's Hybrid IS to compensate for angular and shift camera shake during close-up shooting.
A high-powered 5x Optical Zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer, plus a 28mm Wide-Angle Lens gets you up close and personal to your subjects, as well as capture more in your frame.
Deluxe Accessory Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Ultimate Package Featuring The Canon PowerShot G15 Digital Camera, 3 Piece HD Filter Kit, 16Gb High Speed Memory Card, Extra Battery Pack + 1 Hour AC/DC Battery Charger And More
